item.description:
Your organizer will bring some info on direct solar thermal systems, as an alternative to types of solar heating systems which first generate electricity.

Other members are invited to bring any info they have, as well as to share their personal experience with other types of systems.

Those members who have not already checked out the $200 million ecomagination challenge described by our GE sponsor, are encouraged to click on the logo in the left column and

CHECK THIS OUT!!!

It's important to understand that the quality of life everyone will experience in the future depends on the ingenuity, creativity, and foresight of ecologically-minded people like us!

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Alternative Heating & Cooling Systems
